tv-series.name: All of Us Are Dead
tv-series.description: After a zombie virus spreads through their school, a group of trapped teens must find a way out or end up infected.

tv-series.name: Rick and Morty
tv-series.description: Brilliant but boozy scientist Rick hijacks his fretful teenage grandson, Morty, for wild escapades in other worlds and alternate dimensions.

tv-series.name: Cobra Kai
tv-series.description: Decades after the tournament that changed their lives, the rivalry between Johnny and Daniel reignites in this sequel to the "Karate Kid" films.

tv-series.name: Squid Game
tv-series.description: Hundreds of cash-strapped players accept a rare invitation to compete in children's games. Inside awaits an irresistible prize... with a deadly risk.

tv-series.name: Suits
tv-series.description: When he impresses a big lawyer with his razor-sharp mind, a college dropout scores a coveted associate job, even though he has no legal credentials.
